review: Except to go to work, buy groceries and go to church have I left my couch LOL But seriously, this thing is amazing!!! I was unsure if I wanted to purchase one and I finally set up my movie room in my basement and a friend of mine told me that they'd switch to the Fire TV device after their Apple TV was stolen.  I've been a Prime customer for years and I have a 1st generation Kindle Fire so I figure why not convert and get the FireTV.  Well, my friend told me that Best Buy sold them and I drove with them to the nearest location and low and behold we bought the last one on the shelf! After stopping by Chipotle for dinner, we set up the Amazon Fire TV ( easy as 1,2,3!) and my first movie that we watched was World War Z.  I love the voice search feature and the remote is very sensitive... The only thing that sucks is that my Kindle Fire (1st gen) is not compatible with it.  But I may trade it in for a HD version.  Other than that, I watch all of my fave tv shows, movies and listen to music and I love the screen savers... I recommend this device to anyone that is loves Amazon products and service and wants quality tv without paying a monthly fee for tv watching. There are even apps that you can download and watch tv on (i.e. Youtube, Pluto.tv, etc).  I've also downloaded my HuluPlus and Neflix accounts to my Fire TV device so I'm current with new/current releases.  Love it!!! Get yours today!!!
